import React, { Component } from 'react' import LayoutDashboard from '../../components/LayoutDashboard' import Link from 'next/link' import axios from 'axios' class CreatePost extends Component { state = { title: '', author: '', category_name: '', body_post: '', status_post: '', created_at: '', update_at: '' } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const posts = { title: this.state.title, author: this.state.author, category_name: this.state.category_name, body_post: this.state.body_post, status_post: this.state.status_post, created_at: this.state.created_at, update_at: this.state.update_at }; axios.post(`https://my-json-server.typicode.com/wahyufaturrizky/dbwahyu/posts`,{posts}) .then(res => { console.log(res); console.log(res.data); }) } render () { return ( {/* Main Content */}
